tests.title: redirects to the welcome page
tests.fullTitle: User registration redirects to the welcome page
tests.code:
cy.visit(Cypress.env('USER_URI'));
cy.contains('Sign in or create an account').should('have.class', 'govuk-heading-l');

tests.title: navigates to the start page
tests.fullTitle: User registration navigates to the start page
tests.code:
cy.get('.govuk-button').eq(2).click();
cy.contains('Create an account to manage your water abstraction licence online').should('have.class', 'govuk-heading-l');

tests.title: navigates to the create account page
tests.fullTitle: User registration navigates to the create account page

tests.title: shows a validation message if the email field is empty
tests.fullTitle: User registration shows a validation message if the email field is empty

tests.fullTitle: User registration shows a validation message if the email field is invalid

tests.title: navigates to the success page if the email address is valid
tests.fullTitle: User registration navigates to the success page if the email address is valid

tests.fullTitle: User registration clicks the link in the confirmation email

tests.fullTitle: User registration shows a validation error message if no passwords are entered

tests.fullTitle: User registration shows a validation error message if passwords are too short

tests.fullTitle: User registration shows a validation error message if passwords have correct length only

tests.title: shows a validation error message if passwords have capital only
tests.fullTitle: User registration shows a validation error message if passwords have capital only
